title: Liste
cleaned_text: Published on 29/08/2023 at 22:28 An article claims Bill Gates said in a post on X, formerly known as Twitter, that a "tsunami of mRNA is coming -- whether you like it or not." But the post is fabricated, and the statement appears to have been taken out of context from a Moderna scientist's 2022 TED Talk. Updated on 28/08/2023 at 05:55 on 17/08/2023 at 16:40 Published on 16/08/2023 at 22:47 Published on 09/08/2023 at 16:17 Published
